Detailed Description

Allows accessing the configuration for T9. This configuration file is mandatory for APOXI. The header file may not be changed or extended in any manner, it is only allowed to customize the implementation of the methods. If additional methods are needed for the MMI it is required to create a custom configuration file.

static CHAR* T9InputConfig::LoadT9Udb (  UINT16 &  data_size  )  [static]
 

Returns a pointer to a CHAR array containing the user database. If the database does not exist then it is created, with the size specified in GetT9UdbSize(). The size is written to the parameter data_size.
